mutants.code:
def calculate_months_to_buy_new_car(startPriceOld, startPriceNew, savingperMonth, percentLossByMonth):
    months = 1
    budget = startPriceOld
    loss = percentLossByMonth
    while budget < startPriceNew:
        months += 1
        if months % 2 == 0:
            loss += 0.5
        startPriceOld *= (100 - loss) / 100
        startPriceNew *= (100 - loss) / 100
        budget = savingperMonth * months + startPriceOld
    leftover = round(budget - startPriceNew)
    return [months, leftover]

        startPriceNew *= (100 - loss) / 100
        budget = savingperMonth * months + startPriceOld
    leftover = round(budget - startPriceNew)
    return [months, leftover]

        budget = savingperMonth * months + startPriceOld
    leftover = round(budget - startPriceNew)
    return [months, leftover]

def calculate_months_to_buy_new_car(startPriceOld, startPriceNew, savingperMonth, percentLossByMonth):
    months = 0
    budget = startPriceOld
    loss = percentLossByMonth
    while budget < startPriceNew:
        months += 1
        if months % 0 == 0:
            loss += 0.5
        startPriceOld *= (100 - loss) / 100
        startPriceNew *= (100 - loss) / 100
        budget = savingperMonth * months + startPriceOld
    leftover = round(budget - startPriceNew)
    return [months, leftover]
